mapper.insert: insert into tbl_puser(userid, userpassword, userage, username, usernickname, gendercode, regdate, localcode, loginstatus,userdelete) values(#{userid}, #{userpassword}, #{userage}, #{username}, #{usernickname}, #{gendercode}, now(), #{localcode}, true,0);
insert into tbl_userimg(userid, imgpath, imgshow) values(#{userid}, #{imgpath}, #{imgshow});
insert into tbl_userinfo(userid, userheight, userjob, usercomment) values(#{userid}, #{userheight}, #{userjob}, #{usercomment})
insert into tbl_appointment(userid, latitude, longitude, regdate) values(#{userid}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, now());
